info.name: 有道词典也玩小清新~  Clean Youdao Dict
info.description:
极简风格的有道网页词典界面！
Youdao Dict with a minimal interface!

2013.09.20 最初发布。 The first release.
info.additionalInfo:
2013.09.20 最初发布。 The first release.

Edition based on http://userstyles.org/styles/86502/simpleyoudao
Thanks to the original author zhiyelee~

若有改进意见，请畅所欲言~
Please comment if you have any advices~
